snippet: Altice, whose operations include cable businesses and mobile assets in several European countries and the Caribbean, is expected to use the money to reduce debt, which could allow it to potentially bid for new assets.
abstract: Altice, whose operations include cable businesses and mobile assets in several European countries and the Caribbean, is expected to use the money to reduce debt, which could allow it to potentially bid for new assets.

headline.main: European Cable Operator Altice Plans $1 Billion I.P.O.
